issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Orientation changes set on lightweight are not respected. Currently they must be set on a heavyweight window in order for them to take effect. The issue can be worked around by setting a reference to the heavyweight window on the child lightweight window but a real fix is required.

{html}
fields.summary: Android:  orientation is not respected when set on lightweight window

comments.body:
{html}

Setting as duplicate, didn't need to be opened.

{html}
